content.content: {Three particles A, B, and C, each of mass \vari {m}, lie at rest in that order in a straight line on a smooth horizontal table. The particle A is then projected directly towards B with speed \vari {u}.}
{Find the velocities of the three particles immediately after the second impact, assuming the collisions are perfectly elastic.}

hints.content: {In a completely elastic collision, no kinetic energy is lost.}
